Text: don't forget to normalize? what? this record is already blasted volumewise!

FLAC Compresses the amplitude "db stream" to save space...

So, when I download flac... I convert it to a wav file... throw it in adobe audition, and normalize it to -1db...

I suggest you do the same... so your volume levels will be "perfect"

I think Im just going start uploading wavs to avoid this... : P

I really do hate FLAC...
